name: J.C. Whitlam Manufacturing POWER SEAL PLUS Thread Sealing Compound
description: POWER SEAL PLUS is an all-purpose non-seizing thread sealing compound that produces leak-proof seals on threaded connections. Does not dry out or harden. Lubricates as it seals. POWER SEAL PLUS is manufactured with the finest grade PTFE to provide the smoothest, non-drying, grit free thread sealant available.
